attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: European law often defies common sence. Tho only way  to re-establish the connectionbetween the democratically expressed will of the majority and the law of the land is by repealing the 1972 Act of Accession which made Parliaments law subserviant to Brussels law . this would allow the country to deal with the current problems cause by the Human Rights Act.
